text: I wasn't a big fan of this game, but the music by Kenji Yamamoto (not the one who composed for the Metroid series) is rocking fun. Now Budokai Tenkaichi, that's a game I loved back then. Watching the DBZ cartoon as a kid is probably what made me love anime, such a classic. That and, to a lesser extent, Saint Seiya. If I had to name a 3rd anime that really piqued my interest as a kid, it'd have to be Pok√©mon back in 1998.
